covered: Valid Payload: Tests cover successful account creation with minimum required fields and with optional fields
Invalid Payload: Tests cover malformed JSON, missing required fields, and empty payloads
Duplicate Submission: Tests cover handling of duplicate account data (201 or 409)
Large Payloads: Tests cover boundary large payloads
Validation: Tests validate input data and headers, including invalid header types and XSS/injection
Server Error Handling: Tests cover service unavailability and timeout scenarios (503 and 504)
Authorization: Tests cover missing/invalid authentication or headers leading to 401
Integration/E2E: Tests verify created account retrieval via GET after POST
Performance/Concurrency: Tests cover concurrent account creation and response times
Regression: Tests verify previously fixed issues are resolved
Handling of extra/unexpected headers: Tests verify extra headers are ignored
gaps: Rate Limiting: No tests verifying rate-limiting or throttling for POST /accounts
Caching Behavior: No tests asserting caching headers for POST responses (ETag/Cache-Control)
Validation Gaps: No explicit tests for field-level validation such as email format or numeric ranges within the Account object
Invalid header-type scenarios beyond CreatedBy (e.g., non-string tokens or timestamps)
recommendations: Add a dedicated 500 Internal Server Error test to cover database failures
Add rate-limiting/throttling tests for POST under high load
Add tests to validate caching headers if applicable (ETag/Cache-Control) or clarify no caching for POST
Add explicit field-level validation tests (email formats, numeric ranges) within the Account object
Expand header validation scenarios beyond CreatedBy (e.g., invalid token formats)
